Content: 2*p39308a0224*section aanswer all the questions in this section.  you should aim to spend no more than 20 minutes on this section.  for each question, select one answer from a to d and put a cross in the box . if you change your mind, put a line through the box  and then mark your new answer with a cross .1 which of the following interacts with the nuclei of hydrogen atoms in a nuclear magnetic resonance spectrometer?   a gamma rays  b x-rays  c microwaves  d radio waves(total for question 1 = 1 mark)2 hplc stands for  a high pressure liquid column.  b high performance liquid chromatography.  c heterogeneous phase liquid chromatography.  d homogenous phase liquid column.(total for question 2 = 1 mark)use this space for any rough working.  anything you write in this space will gain no credit.
